patthana3.10:134.1_0: Nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana3.10:135.1_0: Cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṁ abyākatañca nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṁ abyākatañca dhammaṁ paṭicca cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno
patthana3.10:139.1_0: Cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno abyākato dhammo cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānassa abyākatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana3.10:144.1_0: (Yathā kusalattike pañhāvārassa anulomampi paccanīyampi anulomapaccanīyampi paccanīyānulomampi gaṇitaṁ,
patthana3.10:145.1_0: Cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānasahabhuṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānasahabhū kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana3.10:146.1_0: Nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānasahabhuṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānasahabhū kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.10:147.1_0: Cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānasahabhuṁ kusalañca nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānasahabhuṁ kusalañca dhammaṁ paṭicca
patthana3.10:148.1_0: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe pañca …pe… avigate pañca. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.10:150.1_0: Cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānasahabhuṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānasahabhū akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana3.10:152.1_0: Cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānasahabhuṁ akusalañca nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānasahabhuṁ akusalañca dhammaṁ paṭicca
patthana3.10:153.1_0: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe pañca …pe… avigate pañca. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.10:155.1_0: Cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānasahabhuṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānasahabhū abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.10:156.1_0: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava …pe… avigate nava.
patthana3.10:157.1_0: Cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānuparivattiṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānuparivattī kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana3.10:158.1_0: Nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānuparivattiṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānuparivattī kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.10:159.1_1: paṭicca cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānuparivattī kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.10:160.1_0: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe pañca …pe… avigate pañca. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.10:162.1_0: Cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānuparivattiṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānuparivattī akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.10:163.1_0: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe pañca …pe… avigate pañca. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.10:165.1_0: Cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānuparivattiṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānuparivattī abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.10:166.1_0: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava …pe… avigate nava.
patthana3.10:167.1_0: Ajjhattikaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca bāhiro kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.10:168.1_0: Bāhiraṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca bāhiro kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.10:168.1_1: Bāhiraṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ajjhattiko kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.10:168.1_2: Bāhiraṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ajjhattiko kusalo ca bāhiro kusalo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana3.10:169.1_0: Ajjhattikaṁ kusalañca bāhiraṁ kusalañca dhammaṁ paṭicca bāhiro kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.10:170.1_0: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe pañca …pe… avigate pañca.
patthana3.10:171.1_0: Ajjhattikaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca bāhiro akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.10:172.1_0: Bāhiraṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca bāhiro akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.10:172.1_1: Bāhiraṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ajjhattiko akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.10:172.1_2: Bāhiraṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ajjhattiko akusalo ca bāhiro akusalo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana3.10:173.1_0: Ajjhattikaṁ akusalañca bāhiraṁ akusalañca dhammaṁ paṭicca bāhiro akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.10:174.1_0: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe pañca …pe… avigate pañca.
patthana3.10:175.1_0: Ajjhattikaṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ajjhattiko abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana3.10:176.1_0: Bāhiraṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca bāhiro abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana3.10:177.1_0: Ajjhattikaṁ abyākatañca bāhiraṁ abyākatañca dhammaṁ paṭicca ajjhattiko abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana3.10:181.1_0: Bāhiro abyākato dhammo bāhirassa abyākatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.10:182.1_0: Bāhiro abyākato dhammo bāhirassa abyākatassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana3.10:184.1_0: Noupādā kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca noupādā kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.10:185.1_0: Hetuyā ekaṁ, ārammaṇe ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.10:187.1_0: Noupādā akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca noupādā akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.10:188.1_0: Hetuyā ekaṁ, ārammaṇe ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.10:190.1_0: Upādā abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca noupādā abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.10:191.1_0: Noupādā abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca noupādā abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.10:191.1_1: Noupādā abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca upādā abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.10:191.1_2: Noupādā abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca upādā abyākato ca noupādā abyākato ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana3.10:192.1_0: Upādā abyākatañca noupādā abyākatañca dhammaṁ paṭicca noupādā abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.10:196.1_0: Noupādā abyākato dhammo noupādā abyākatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana3.10:197.1_0: Upādā abyākato dhammo noupādā abyākatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana3.10:198.1_0: Noupādā abyākato dhammo noupādā abyākatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana3.10:199.1_0: Noupādā abyākato dhammo noupādā abyākatassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana3.10:200.1_0: Upādā abyākato dhammo noupādā abyākatassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana3.10:201.1_0: Noupādā abyākato dhammo noupādā abyākatassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.10:203.1_0: Anupādinnaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anupādinno kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.10:205.1_0: Anupādinnaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anupādinno akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.10:207.1_0: Upādinnaṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca upādinno abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana3.10:208.1_0: Anupādinnaṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anupādinno abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.10:209.1_0: Upādinnaṁ abyākatañca anupādinnaṁ abyākatañca dhammaṁ paṭicca anupādinno abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—upādinne
patthana3.10:209.1_1: khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ.
patthana3.10:212.1_0: Upādinno abyākato dhammo upādinnassa abyākatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana3.10:213.1_0: Anupādinno abyākato dhammo anupādinnassa abyākatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana3.10:214.1_0: Anupādinno abyākato dhammo anupādinnassa abyākatassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇādhipati,
patthana3.10:215.1_0: Upādinno abyākato dhammo upādinnassa abyākatassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇapurejātaṁ,
patthana3.10:216.1_0: Anupādinno abyākato dhammo anupādinnassa abyākatassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo … dve.
